content: आभ्युदयिक {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (की|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [ अभ्युदयठक्] {@--1@} Tending to good, granting prosperity; अनाभ्यदयिकं श्रमणकदर्शनं <ls>Mk. 8.</ls> {@--2@} Relating to the rise or beginning of anything; सुख° <ls>Ms. 12. 88.</ls> {@--3@} High, exalted, important. --कं A Śrāddha or offering to ancestors; an occasion of rejoicing.
